backend/main.mo: Actor manages contacts, appointment requests, user profiles, domain drafts, and admin-controlled decommission mode using access control and persistent maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing site restyling and layout updates with associated files, components, and requirement mappings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated summaries of all frontend components, pages, hooks, forms, and styles for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers with OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens applied globally.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry point defining metadata, SEO tags, icons, and root mount for the React app.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots configuration allowing all crawlers and declaring sitemap location.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing main site URLs with priorities and change frequencies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for all pages wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/forms/Appointmen: Form component for submitting appointment requests with validation, success/error handling, and department selection.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Implements a contact form with validation, submission via a custom hook, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with branding, contact info, hours, and attribution links.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Provides a responsive site header with navigation, emergency contact info, and Google search link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Wraps all pages with SEO management, header, footer, and layout structure.
frontend/src/components/seo/Organization: Injects JSON‑LD structured data describing the medical organization.
frontend/src/components/seo/SeoManager.t: Dynamically updates document head tags for SEO based on the current route.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines hospital branding constants and a helper to build page titles.
frontend/src/config/contactDetails.ts: Stores centralized contact details and utilities for generating phone links.
frontend/src/config/seo.ts: Defines SEO configuration, per‑route metadata, and helpers for generating titles and URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to user identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDomainDraft.ts: File exists but contains no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using Dfinity AuthClient, including login, identity loading, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitAppointmentR: Defines a mutation hook that sends appointment request data to the backend actor with normalized error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContact.ts: Defines a mutation hook to submit contact form data through the backend actor with user-friendly error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and defines a custom light/dark medical-themed design system using CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, core values, and feature sections using UI cards and icons.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentRequestPag: Displays the appointment request flow, including steps overview and the appointment request form.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact details and a contact form, including phone, email, address, and hours sections.
frontend/src/pages/DecommissionedPage.ts: Displays a notice informing users the site is decommissioned and no longer accepting submissions.
frontend/src/pages/DoctorsPage.tsx: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/DomainDraftPage.tsx: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyPage.tsx: Renders a detailed emergency services page with a hero call button, service cards, and information sections.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with hero content, navigation buttons, images, and Google search link plus SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Shows a simple 404 page with title update and button to return home.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Provides a services overview page listing medical services with icons and navigation options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, container settings, animations, and custom utilities.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state for restyling a website to resemble the Kavurey Hospital site, including existing features and a pending new feature request. Contains metadata like schema version, project name, and design requirements.
